1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Operators for text match.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Char
6 ( -- * Character
7   char, word,
8   space, spaces, spaces1,
9   digit, letter,
10 ) where
11
12import qualified Data.Char                                   as C
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Expr                as S
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Basic      as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Repeat     as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Operator.Combine    as S
17
18-- | Match some character in a list of characters.
19char :: [Char] -> S.Expr Char
20char = S.list
21
22-- | Match some word in a list of words from space-separated string.
23word :: String -> S.Expr Char
24word w = S.or (S.equal <$> words w)
25
26-- | Match space character.
27space :: S.Expr Char
28space = S.elem "space" C.isSpace
29
30-- | Match zero-or-more space characters.
31spaces :: S.Expr Char
32spaces = S.many space
33
34-- | Match one-or-more space characters.
35spaces1 :: S.Expr Char
36spaces1 = S.many1 space
37
38-- | Match digit characters.
39digit :: S.Expr Char
40digit = S.elem "digit" C.isDigit
41
42-- | Match letter characters.
43letter :: S.Expr Char
44letter = S.elem "letter" C.isLetter
45
